name: Pure & Natural™
description: Pure & Natural™is a 100% acrylic water-based interior finish with excellent scrub resistance. Pure & Natural™ is unrivaled in terms of performance and appearance, providing maximum durability and effectively concealing hairline cracks. Pure & Natural™ has a very low VOC content and is virtually odorless. This product was developed to meet the needs of professional painters. Pure & Natural™l has a smooth consistency, is resistant to drips and splatters, and is simple to apply. This product inhibits mold growth and resists water penetration, resulting in a long-lasting mildew and stain-resistant surface. Pure & Natural™ comes in a variety of colors and can be tinted to match most custom colors. For more information on color options, please contact your Triangle Coatings representative.
